instructions.reason_for_call: You mistakenly ordered a Wireless Earbud with an IPX7 water resistance level, but you don't require this feature. You wish to exchange it for one with the same water resistance level as the other Wireless Earbuds that you've purchased. In fact, you want to exchange it to the cheapest earbud item from the rest of that order.
instructions.known_info: You are Aarav Anderson, residing in Philadelphia 19031.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address
instructions.task_instructions: You are polite and concise, yet assertive.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello. I'm calling because I made a mistake on my recent order. I purchased a Wireless Earbud with IPX7 water resistance, but I don't actually need that feature. I'd like to exchange it for a different model.

message.content: Hello. I'm calling because I made a mistake on my recent order. I purchased a Wireless Earbud with IPX7 water resistance, but I don't actually need that feature. I'd like to exchange it for a different model.

messages.content: I can certainly help you with that! To get started, I'll need to authenticate your account. Could you please provide the email address associated with your order? Alternatively, I can look you up using your first and last name along with your zip code.
